name: Night at the lab
description:
This game was made for the B&W Jam Hosted by Lone Rabbit, with the themes of "You only realize the value of something when it's gone." and Black&White games.

In this mini thriller game, you play Damien whose father is in some kind of danger in his laboratory. Investigate and discover what danger lies in this building.

This is my first stab at making a narrative game, I hope you'll like it!
